definition: to help/to do a favor/(Shanghainese) Come on!/Give me a break!
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: Should we get out and help?
Couldn"t you do me a favor and leave me alone?"
sentences.chinese: 能帮帮忙别留下我独自一人吗？

sentences.english: My car's engine died at the beltway, can you help me ?
sentences.chinese: 我的车在环城路上死火了，你能帮帮忙吗？

sentences.english: You can do something for me later.
sentences.chinese: 你可以等以后，给我帮帮忙就行。

sentences.english: Have you received the mooncakes sended at 30th.
sentences.chinese: 麻烦大家了，帮帮忙30号送你的月饼收到了吗？

sentences.english: Stop fucking around and come and help.
sentences.chinese: 别瞎胡闹了，过来帮帮忙。

sentences.english: and I always helped out in her classroom.
sentences.chinese: 而且我总在她的课堂上帮帮忙。

sentences.english: Jim can't get down from the tree. Can you help him?
sentences.chinese: 吉姆从树上下不来了。你能帮帮忙吗？

sentences.english: Stop messing about and come and help!
I was going to ask him to lend me a hand when he came just in time.
sentences.chinese: 我正想找他来帮帮忙，可好他来了。

sentences.english: Oh, I am a little cold, can you help me ? Would you please lend me a coat ? (
sentences.chinese: 哦，我有点冷，你能帮帮忙，借我一件衣服穿吗？

sentences.english: Give full archive with all libraries, without them, the application does not start …
sentences.chinese: 这么强大的地方，难道就没有高手肯出来帮帮忙吗？

definition: to request sb to do sth/please!
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/vexation/inconvenience
to be generous (idiom)/to be magnanimous/Give me a break!
you're welcome/don't mention it/no need to stand on ceremony
another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
